A reverse image search reveals that the: known as the "Bookkeeper of Auschwitz," a Nazi SS guard.
The photo used as evidence of Soros: alleged Nazi past is from the Museum of Auschwitz-Birkenau and is confirmed to be Oskar Groening by the Auschwitz Memorial.
George Soros: who was born in 1930, would have been only 9 years old at the time the first prisoners arrived at Auschwitz, making it impossible for him to be the person in the photo.
